editions.effect:
Up to one target ally gets -1 [POWER] until end of turn. If that ally is an Automaton, put two **debuff** counters on it instead.

**Floating Memory**

effect:

**Floating Memory**

rule.description: If a debuff counter were to put a unit's life at or below 0, the unit will die
Placing debuff counters on a unit with buff counters will cause equal amounts of debuff and buff counters to be removed.
